attributes.action: intervene to close Houghton Quarry landfill site because of inherent environmental dangers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The site is on the highest point within the town of houghton-le-spring in the north-east of england within 20m of habitation and deep within aquifers supplying 500,000 people.  it is leaking and polluting the water and polluting the air.
